item.description:
On Saturday, Aug 20 at 4 pm, Red Bull is going to be hosting a free urban cliff diving event at the ICA in Boston.  

Here is the link

and a better link

There's a few good places to have drinks nearby.  Alex used to bar-back at a place called Sam's, which is within line-sight of the ICA and has everything from $3 Narraganset tall-boys to $12 fancy house cocktails.  I'm saying if the waves are good, we go surf.  If the waves aren't good, we go have drinks and watch people huck themselves off a 70 ft. building.

Alex scoped out a meeting spot.  if you google-map-street-view your way over to 152 Seaport Blvd., Boston, you'll find yourself at the intersection of Seaport Blvd., Northern Ave, and East Service Road.  Spin yourself around until you see a white sign that says "Anthony's Pier 4" (note, there are two of these signs within view.  i'm talking about the closer one that's on Seaport Blvd, not the one that's slightly farther down Northern Ave.)  behind that sign are two large white anchors sitting on the grass.  let's meet on, near, around, between, or inside those anchors.  within stone's throw of this is the Atlantic Beer Garden and the ICA.  

let's meet at 2:30.  gives us some time to grab a beer before the event.  eh?
item.name: Watch Urban Cliff Diving
